Sentencas: The Ca(V(0.5)Mo(0.5))O(3) perovskite has been prepared in order to study its potential use as anode in SOFC.
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode

Sentencas: The crystal structure has been refined, by neutron powder diffraction, in the orthorhombic Pbnm space group (no. 62).
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity values were over 525 S cm(-1) in the studied temperature range (25-800 degrees C).
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode

Sentencas: The sample is stable under reducing working conditions (H(2)/N(2) 10:90, 25-900 degrees C).
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode

Sentencas: This orthorhombic phase transforms at 500 degrees C in air to the tetragonal I4(1)/a scheelite phase.
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode

Sentencas: This transition is reversible and, due to the fact that the thermal expansion coefficients of both, the reduced and oxidized phases, are very similar and match well with those of the other cell components ((10(-13)) x 10(-6) K(-1))
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode

Sentencas: this materials are presented as excellent candidates as anodes in SOFCs.
Titulo: Structure, thermal stability and electrical properties of Ca(V0.5Mo0.5)O3 as solid oxide fuel cell anode
